Go on
blog_bit: [Redacted Day] is 11 February, every year in memory of Aaron Swartz. Listen in as we discuss Windows 10 as a free update, the new Raspberry Pi 2 with twice the memory and four CPUs for the same money (Â£25) & running Win 10 and the rise of bots getting arrested (poker bot, art installation Darknet & robot vacuum cleaner eating hair).
blog_more: Hang on as we discuss the return of Pirate Bay, more (or less) Snoopers Charter & Lovely Horse, the last of the Leeds Hack reports featuring Tom, Harry and Adam with their Raspberry Pi controlled Robot and Wes with his Drama Dive before we end on upcoming Bradford Events including Bradford CoderDojo (21st March), Badonkadonk (Every Second Tuesday of the month), Button Mash.
